source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, ever a sight for sore eyes! What brings you here this day? Are you come to see our progress, or perhaps to contribute to it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_000やあ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
もしかして、蒼天街の様子を見にきてくれたのかな？
それとも、物資の納品に？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_001<tab>In any case, I owe you a debt of gratitude. Thanks to able and willing helpers such as your good self, the reconstruction effort proceeds apace. This court has fairly been reborn, I believe you will agree.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_001キミのような職人たちのおかげで、
着々と物資が集まって、復興が進んでいるよ。
この広場も、ずいぶんきれいになったと思わないかい？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_AUGEBERT_000_002<tab>Oi, Francel. I've finished my checks, and everything looks to be order. That's that for the court, I reckon.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_AUGEBERT_000_002どうも、フランセル坊ちゃん。
この広場の作業は全工程完了して、現場確認もしたんで、
ご報告にあがりやした。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_003<tab>Glad am I to hear it. This is a momentous step in our project─one we could not have taken without the aid of Ishgardians and outsiders alike.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_003オーグベルトさん、いいところに。
イシュガルドの民の尽力はもちろん、
外部から多くの職人たちが、駆けつけてくれたおかげだね。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_AUGEBERT_000_004<tab>Aye. At last, we've got a flow of materials comin' in, along with the hands to put it all to use. It begins in earnest.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_AUGEBERT_000_004ええ、ほんとに。
ようやくいろんなものや人手が揃って、
いよいよ、蒼天街の本格的な復興が始められますわぁ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_005<tab>That it does, my friend. That it does.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_005そうだね。
やっとスタートラインに立った、というところかな。
これから、大変になるぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_006<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Augebert. There is something I would ask of you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_006それで、考えていたんだけど……
)) (( )) 02 /var>と、オーグベルトさんに、
ちょっと聞いてほしいことがあるんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_007<tab>I bid you commit to your mind's eye the Firmament as it is now.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_007ふたりには、どうか……
この街の「今」を、
僕とともに目に焼きつけておいてほしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_008<tab>When the last paving stone is laid, I would have you fully appreciate how much has been accomplished by the sweat of innumerable brows.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_008この復興事業に参加した人たちが、
どれほどのことを成し遂げることができたのか。
すべての作業が終わったときに、思い出せるように……。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_009<tab>For though Ishgard may arrive at a brighter future, we must never forget the path we walked to get there, fraught with sorrow and sacrifice as it was.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_009そして、これだけの犠牲と、
その分だけ悲しみがあったことを、忘れないために。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_010<tab>If we do so, I fear we will lose our way again.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_010イシュガルドはこれから、
悲しみも希望も抱いたまま、前に進んでいくんだから。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_AUGEBERT_000_011<tab>Heh, same old Francel, though, eh? Try to unclench that jaw of yours a little, lad, else you're liable to give yourself a fever and collapse like you used to.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_AUGEBERT_000_011しっかし、フランセル坊ちゃんは相変わらずですなぁ！
そんなに気負いすぎてると、また熱を出しちまいますよ？
よく剣の稽古や晩餐会のあと、ぶっ倒れてたでしょう？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_012<tab>Those days are long past, thank you very much!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_012それは小さい頃の話だろう！？
知恵熱なんて、もう出さないよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_013<tab><sigh> Just...remember what I asked. And pray keep it private. 'Tis a personal request to the two of you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_013ま、まぁ、今のはここだけの話にしておいてくれ。
あくまで個人的なお願いだから。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_AUGEBERT_000_014<tab>Don't worry, you know I ain't no gossipmonger. Now then, if there's nothing else, I'll get back to it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_AUGEBERT_000_014はいはい、わかってますって。
じゃあ、自分は仕事に戻らせてもらいますぜ。
失礼しやす。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_015<tab>All right, my friend. Take care you do not overwork yourself, and tell the others the same.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_015ああ、ご苦労さま。
ポットキンやエニーたちも、仕事は残っているだろうが……
適度に肩の力を抜きつつ務めるよう、労いの言葉を伝えてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_016<tab>Well, there you have it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. There will be a brief hiatus while we prepare for the next phase of construction. When all is in readiness, I shall make another announcement.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_016キミも、いい折に来てくれてありがとう。
次の復興をどこから着手するか決まったら、また告知を出すよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_017<tab>In the meantime, do rest and recover your strength. 'Twas good to see you again.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_017これからは、本格的な復興作業になるはずだ。
きっと忙しくなるだろうから、キミも……
骨休めをしながらゆっくり待っていて。
